code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TabNavigation=_ref=>{let{tabs,activeTab,handleTabChange,tabRefs}=_ref;const[highlightStyle,setHighlightStyle]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{const updateHighlight=()=>{const currentTab=tabRefs.current[activeTab];if(currentTab){const{offsetLeft,offsetWidth}=currentTab;setHighlightStyle({left:`${offsetLeft}px`,width:`${offsetWidth}px`});}};updateHighlight();window.addEventListener('resize',updateHighlight);return()=>window.removeEventListener('resize',updateHighlight);},[activeTab,tabRefs]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"border-t border-gray-700 mb-8 relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute top-0 h-0.5 bg-purple-500 transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out",style:highlightStyle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"flex justify-center space-x-12 -mt-px",children:tabs.map(tab=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{ref:el=>tabRefs.current[tab.value]=el,className:"pt-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>handleTabChange(tab.value),className:`flex items-center transition-colors duration-300 ${activeTab===tab.value?'text-purple-400':'text-gray-400'}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(tab.icon,{size:12,className:"mr-1"}),tab.name]})},tab.value))})]});};export default TabNavigation;
